page.title: 16Notable events
page.content: Over the year there have been various social events.There have been a number of fetes and dances for charities that have been supported well, for example a Traidcraft fair ,and a dance in aid of the physically handicapped.The school production this year sent much of its proceeds to the African famine appeal.The entertainments committee at Croft have put on a show entitled"Croft Repeats".This was a collection of the best sketches from previous shows.This was extremely popular.The committee has arrange ,as usual, a birthday week celebration.The Croft quiz finals will be held then.There will also be a major road race, a fruit and vegetable show together with various displays by affiliated groups.At the end of the week there will be the annual dance.This is always popular.
